testcase.name: TaskRequest should support all task types()
TaskRequest with null comment should pass validation()
TaskRequest should have correct data class properties()
TaskRequest with null deadline should pass validation()
TaskRequest with minimal required fields should pass validation()
TaskRequest with null date should fail validation - concept test()
TaskRequest should support all priority values()
